title: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first pagei. the first and second column could be mergedj.
OB:
a. buttons are too small
b. when coming up, no table entry is selected. however, both move buttons are enabled
e. when changing a param name to something very long, the preview is cut off
g. dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters
EB:
a. Marking between button and list is too large, top button should be aligned with dialog top
b. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic
d. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up / down can be applied on more than one item
f. Signature preview must be a label that wraps
h. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover
SR:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Observe the size of the buttons.
3. Observe that no table entry is selected when the dialog comes up.
4. Observe that both move buttons are enabled when the dialog comes up.
5. Change a parameter name to something very long and observe the preview.
6. Observe that the dialog appears huge for methods with many parameters.
7. Check the marking between the button and list and ensure it is not too large.
8. Verify that the top button is aligned with the dialog top.
9. Ensure that the table has a label to support a mnemonic.
10. Verify that multiple selection is allowed for the table.
11. Test move up / down functionality with more than one selected item.
12. Check if the signature preview wraps correctly.
13. Observe if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
